contact.bio_1: I started ‘A Rose in Bloom’ with the hope of creating space for one to bloom and discover their full potential. To me, photography and yoga flow seamlessly together. Both create an internal & external balance of confidence and innate joy.
contact.bio_2: Whether it be in asana (yoga pose), discovering newfound space and movement in the body or through a photo capturing ones true essence — my intention is to create a comfortable environment to help you meet your needs and achieve that ‘aha’ moment.

yoga.title: Yoga is a healing modality.
yoga.subtitle: Mentally. Physically. Emotionally.
yoga.description: Personally, it has helped me immensely in overcoming stress, injury & anxiety. I enrolled in my first teacher-training because deep down I saw how much the practice of yoga healed me. I felt compelled to bring that same healing & peace to everyone else.
yoga.certifications: 200hr ERYT in Power, Sculpt, Yin + meditation with the addition of yoga/barre classes stemming from my ballet background.

classes.description: Create the type of class that YOU want. The time and space is all yours!
Move and breathe with family or friends.
Hosting an event? Offer a yoga + meditation session to set the tone.

reviews.text: My private Yoga Session with Emma brought me back to center. It was the workout my body needed with the safety my mind needed. She leads class with such grace and intention, I felt as strong as I did at peace. I have now had Emma come to my home to lead Yoga twice and each time gets better than the last. I would highly recommend Emma for a private session. Safety and Strength.

Emma has been teaching yoga to my family and I privately now for a few years. Not only is she incredibly good at what she does but she creates a safe space for us to practice simply with her energy and words. Emma has been my families go to for events, birthday parties, or even when we just need to chill after a stressful time. More specifically Emma was extremely Covid friendly these last few times we practiced yoga. She respects your space, and still has a hands on approach to teaching but FROM A DISTANCE.

Emma has always been a go-to instructor for our lululemon yoga events. She is able to adjust her classes in the moment to fit the needs of whoever comes to class. Her ability to make class inclusive and challenging for all levels makes her a stand-out instructor (and I’ve used a LOT of yoga instructors for store events over the last 3 years.) I frequently have class participants reach out to thank me for the high quality class whenever Emma has taught. Truly the best instructor I’ve had the pleasure to work with!
reviews.attribution: Tori S. (lululemon assistant store manager & community lead)

reviews.text: Emma led a yoga class with six of my friends for my birthday at my house. We practiced in the open air, with our mats 6-feet apart from each other, and we all felt very safe. It was a nice work from home distraction, break from the news, and overall felt really good to be able to practice yoga again. Her 60 minute flow was the perfect combination of challenging and feeling good on the body. Emma was very specific in her moves, helpful with making sure our posture was right, and just made everyone feel safe and calm. At the end of the class we all felt stronger, flexible, and minds were more relaxed.

I was practicing yoga on and off for the last few years. I strongly believe that yoga is a practice that connects the mind to the body and I struggled to find a teacher that aligned with my values until I took Emma’s class. The way she genuinely and intentionally intertwines the two leaves me beyond fulfilled every time.

bio_1: I started ‘A Rose in Bloom’ with the hope of creating space for one to bloom and discover their full potential. To me, photography and yoga flow seamlessly together. Both create an internal & external balance of confidence and innate joy.
bio_2: Whether it be in asana (yoga pose), discovering newfound space and movement in the body or through a photo capturing ones true essence — my intention is to create a comfortable environment to help you meet your needs and achieve that ‘aha’ moment.
